document_title: Ventricular extrasystole: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content: Ventricular extrasystoles themselves can be a manifestation of serious cardiovascular diseases such as heart failure, coronary artery disease..., which are diseases with a risk of death. On the other hand, too much ventricular extrasystoles over time will reduce heart function leading to heart failure. (3)
subsection_title: ngoai tam thu that.json. Are ventricular extrasystoles dangerous?
subsection_data:
ngoai tam thu that.json. Are ventricular extrasystoles dangerous?
Ventricular extrasystoles themselves can be a manifestation of serious cardiovascular diseases such as heart failure, coronary artery disease..., which are diseases with a risk of death. On the other hand, too much ventricular extrasystoles over time will reduce heart function leading to heart failure. (3)
